trans-unit.source: Represents an item in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref> control in an application that was upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.
trans-unit.target: 表示中的项<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListBox"></xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox"></xref>的应用程序从 Visual Basic 6.0 升级中的控件。

trans-unit.source: In Visual Basic 6.0, the `ListBox` and `ComboBox` controls use a `List` property to store list items and an `ItemData` property to optionally store an `Integer` associated with each list item.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 中，`ListBox`和`ComboBox`控制是否使用`List`属性来存储列表项和`ItemData`属性可以根据需要存储`Integer`与每个列表项相关联。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> controls use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> property to store list items, and the `ItemData` property is no longer supported.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控制是否使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A>属性来存储列表项和`ItemData`不再支持属性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox.Items%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: When a Visual Basic 6.0 application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the upgrade tools create a `ListBoxItem` class for each item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 应用程序升级到[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，升级工具创建`ListBoxItem`类中每个项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> functions can then be used to enable any code that references the `ItemData` property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A>然后可以使用函数以启用引用的任何代码`ItemData`属性。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When a Visual Basic 6.0 application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the upgrade tools create a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem> class for each item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 在 Visual Basic 6.0 应用程序升级到[!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]，升级工具创建<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem>类中每个项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>控件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A> and <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> functions can then be used to enable any code that references the `ItemData` property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A>和<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A>然后可以使用函数以启用引用的任何代码`ItemData`属性。</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.GetItemData%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.Support.SetItemData%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the list item.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含列表项。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When a Visual Basic 6.0 application is upgraded to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)], the upgrade tools create a <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem> class for each item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox> control.

trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含列表项。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: An <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""></xref> that represents the Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemData" name="ItemData" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Integer" name="Integer" href=""> </xref>表示 Visual Basic 6.0 <xref uid="langword_csharp_ItemData" name="ItemData" href=""> </xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref> to a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 将转换<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref>到<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem> cannot be converted to a <xref:System.String>; you must call the `ToString` method to convert the type.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem>不能转换为<xref:System.String>; 必须调用`ToString`方法以将类型转换。</xref:System.String> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the value of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含值的<xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListBoxItem"> </xref>。</xref:System.String>
